description: Home repair jobs start with a diagnostic visit fee; larger repairs may require a follow-up estimate.
questions: What is the main issue (e.g., leak, electrical, structural, cosmetic)?
How long has this issue been present?
Have any previous repairs been attempted?
Are there photos or videos of the issue you can share?

includes: Basic troubleshooting and minor fixes if time allows
Recommendation and estimate if a larger repair is needed

operator_guidance: Use the diagnostic visit_fee as the initial quote when the scope is unclear or could be large.
If the description is clearly a small fix, you may quote a simple flat repair price instead of diagnostic-only.
For major repairs, explain that the first visit is for diagnosis and a follow-up estimate will be provided after inspection.
